actions.recommendation: -Pap smears are a recommended screening test for sexually active females. Please consider the HPV vaccine. This will lower your risk of contracting the HPV virus- thus lowering your risk of developing cervical cancer.
-BMI a 29 is raised. This increase the risk of conditions such as diabetes & hypertension. Aim to keep your BMI between 18.5- 24.9 & your waist-to-height ratio below 50%.
-Supplement vitamin D, aim for levels above 20ng/ml.
-Your heart rate is slow, please monitor this. If you do experience symptoms of bradycardia a cardiology review is advised.
